trans-unit.source: Represents an add-in that can be activated.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以激活的外接程序。

trans-unit.source: An AddInToken object represents an add-in, and its associated pipeline segments, that can be activated.
trans-unit.target: AddInToken 对象表示外接程序和其关联的管道段，可激活。

trans-unit.source: The token contains the name, assembly name, description, publisher, and version of the add-in that it represents.
trans-unit.target: 令牌包含名称、 程序集名称、 说明、 发布者和它所代表的外接程序版本。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.FindAddIns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get a collection of tokens that represent add-ins whose pipelines match a specified host view.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.FindAddIns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来获取标记，表示其管道匹配指定的主机视图的外接程序的集合。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.FindAddIns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.FindAddIn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get a collection of tokens that represent all the pipelines for a specified add-in that match a specified host view.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.FindAddIn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法获取表示指定的外接所有与指定的主机视图匹配的管道的令牌的集合。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.FindAddIn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To activate an add-in, pass the token that represents the desired add-in to the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要激活外接程序，请将传递表示所需外接程序到令牌<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>方法。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns an instance of the type that represents the host view of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回表示外接程序的主机视图的类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> method has several overloads.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>方法有多个重载。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use an overload that does not require the name of an application domain as one of its parameters, a new application domain for the add-in is automatically created.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用的重载，不需要的应用程序域的名称作为其参数之一时，将自动创建一个新的应用程序域外接程序。

trans-unit.source: You can use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) extension methods to perform queries on an AddInToken, treating the token as a collection of <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem> structures.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用语言集成查询 (LINQ) 的扩展方法在 AddInToken，将该令牌视为的集合上执行查询<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>结构。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace and type of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取命名空间和外接程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: This property obtains the full name of the add-in as it would be returned by the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取外接程序的完整名称，如将由返回<xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This value is always available on an instance of an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> object.
trans-unit.target: 此值始终为的实例上可用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>对象。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>

trans-unit.source: The type of the add-in, fully qualified by its namespace.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序，由其命名空间完全限定的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the assembly that contains the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含外接程序的程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property obtains the display name of the assembly that contains the add-in, as it would be returned by the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取包含外接程序的程序集的显示名称，如将由返回<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This value is always available on an instance of an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> object.
trans-unit.target: 此值始终为的实例上可用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>对象。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取外接程序的说明。

trans-unit.source: This property obtains the description of the add-in as specified in the <xref:System.AddIn.AddInAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取中指定外接程序的说明<xref:System.AddIn.AddInAttribute>属性。</xref:System.AddIn.AddInAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A description of the add-in, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the description is not specified in the <xref href="System.AddIn.AddInAttribute"></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序的说明或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果中未指定说明<xref href="System.AddIn.AddInAttribute"></xref>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that indicates whether add-ins should be directly connected to their hosts when conditions permit.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置一个值，指示在条件允许时外接程序是否应直接连接到它们的宿主。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must exist for the direct connection to occur: - This property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 要进行直接连接必须存在以下条件:-此属性必须设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: - The add-in must be in the same application domain as the host.
trans-unit.target: -外接程序必须与主机相同的应用程序域中。

trans-unit.source: - The add-in view and the host view of the add-in must be the same type.
trans-unit.target: -外接程序视图和外接程序的主机视图必须是相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: - All the segments of the pipeline must be available.
trans-unit.target: 的管道所有段都必须可用。

trans-unit.source: When a direct connection is established, the add-in-side adapter and the host-side adapter are not instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 如果建立直接连接，则外接程序端适配器和主机端适配器未实例化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the add-in should be directly connected to the host; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果外接程序应直接连接到主机;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified object is equal to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否等于当前实例。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object and the current instance are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的对象与当前实例是否相等。否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the qualification data of the pipeline segments that are associated with this token.
trans-unit.target: 返回与此令牌相关联的管道段的限定数据的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to treat a token as if it were a collection of qualification data items, for example, in a `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in Visual C++).
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法将一个令牌，就像它是项的集合限定数据，例如，在`foreach`语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中， `for each` Visual c + +)。

trans-unit.source: Use the enumerator returned by this method to iterate through the qualification data items of the pipeline segments associated with the current token.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法返回的枚举器循环访问与当前的令牌相关联的管道段限定数据项。

trans-unit.source: Each item of qualification data is a <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem> structure that identifies the pipeline segment and contains a name/value pair from a <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute> attribute applied to that segment.
trans-unit.target: 限定数据的每个项是<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>结构，用于标识的管道段以及包含名称/值对从<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute>属性应用于该段。</xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The add-in model does not use qualification data that is applied to the host view of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 外接程序模型不使用限定数据应用于的外接程序的主机视图。

trans-unit.source: As a result, when you enumerate qualification data you will not find any items whose <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem.Segment%2A> property is <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当枚举限定数据操作时你将找不到任何项<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem.Segment%2A>属性是<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem.Segment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A> property to get a nested set of dictionaries that contain the qualification data of the pipeline segments.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A>属性来获取一组嵌套包含限定数据的管道段的字典。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the qualification data of the pipeline segments that are associated with the current token.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举器可用于循环访问与当前的令牌相关联的管道段的限定数据。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a token.
trans-unit.target: 用作令牌的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current token.
trans-unit.target: 当前的令牌哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取外接程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property obtains the name of the add-in as specified in the <xref:System.AddIn.AddInAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取外接程序中指定的名称<xref:System.AddIn.AddInAttribute>属性。</xref:System.AddIn.AddInAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This value is always available on an instance of an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> object.
trans-unit.target: 此值始终为的实例上可用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>对象。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>

trans-unit.source: The name of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the publisher of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取外接程序的发布者。

trans-unit.source: This property obtains the publisher of the add-in as specified in the <xref:System.AddIn.AddInAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取中指定外接程序的发布者<xref:System.AddIn.AddInAttribute>属性。</xref:System.AddIn.AddInAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The publisher of the add-in, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the publisher is not specified in the <xref href="System.AddIn.AddInAttribute"></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序的发布者或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果中未指定发布服务器<xref href="System.AddIn.AddInAttribute"></xref>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of data about the segments in the pipeline associated with the current token.
trans-unit.target: 获取与当前的令牌相关联的管道中的数据段的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to obtain data that has been applied to pipeline segments with the <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于获取已应用于管道段使用的数据<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute>属性。</xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can use this data to identify and work with the types that compose your pipelines.
trans-unit.target: 此数据可用于标识和处理撰写管道的类型。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a dictionary of dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字典的字典。

trans-unit.source: The top dictionary always has six keys.
trans-unit.target: 顶级字典始终具有六个键。

trans-unit.source: Each key is an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType> value for a segment in the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 每个键是<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType>管道中的段的值。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType>

trans-unit.source: Each value is a generic <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>of strings with string keys that contains the segment's qualification data.
trans-unit.target: 每个值是一个泛型<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>具有包含数据分段的限定的字符串键的字符串。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>

trans-unit.source: The keys and values of these inner dictionaries are the names and values specified in the <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute> attributes for the segments.
trans-unit.target: 密钥和这些内部字典的值都是名称和值中指定<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute>段的属性。</xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If no qualification data has been applied to a segment, its dictionary is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何限定数据已不应用到的段，其字典为空。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The add-in model does not use qualification data that is applied to the host view of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 外接程序模型不使用限定数据应用于的外接程序的主机视图。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the dictionary for <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType?displayProperty=fullName> is always empty.
trans-unit.target: 因此，字典中是否的<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType?displayProperty=fullName>始终为空。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can obtain qualification data by enumerating an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> as if it were a collection of <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem> structures, using a `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in Visual C++).
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以通过枚举中获取限定数据<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>就像它是一套<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>结构，而使用`foreach`语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中， `for each` Visual c + +)。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>

trans-unit.source: See the example provided for the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem> structure.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅提供的示例<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>结构。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary whose keys are pipeline segments and whose values are dictionaries of name/value pairs that represent qualification data for each segment.
trans-unit.target: 一个字典，其键为管线段，其值为字典的名称/值对该表示限定数据以供每个段。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the qualification data of the pipeline segments that are associated with this token.
trans-unit.target: 返回与此令牌相关联的管道段的限定数据的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: This method allows a token to be treated like a collection of qualification data items, for example in a `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in Visual C++).
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许令牌被视为集合的限定数据项，例如在`foreach`语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中， `for each` Visual c + +)。

trans-unit.source: Use the enumerator returned by this method to iterate through the qualification data items of the pipeline segments associated with the current token.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法返回的枚举器循环访问与当前的令牌相关联的管道段限定数据项。

trans-unit.source: Each item of qualification data is a <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem> structure that identifies the pipeline segment and contains the name/value pair from a <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute> attribute applied to that segment.
trans-unit.target: 限定数据的每个项是<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>结构，用于标识的管道段以及包含名称/值对从<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute>属性应用于该段。</xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The add-in model does not use qualification data that is applied to the host view of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 外接程序模型不使用限定数据应用于的外接程序的主机视图。

trans-unit.source: As a result, when you enumerate qualification data you will not find any items whose <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem.Segment%2A> property is <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当枚举限定数据操作时你将找不到任何项<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem.Segment%2A>属性是<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem.Segment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A> property to get a nested set of dictionaries containing the qualification data of the pipeline segments.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A>属性来获取一组嵌套包含限定数据的管道段的字典。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the qualification data of the pipeline segments that are associated with the current token.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举器可用于循环访问与当前的令牌相关联的管道段的限定数据。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the token.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，表示令牌。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the token.
trans-unit.target: 表示令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the add-in, as specified in the <xref href="System.AddIn.AddInAttribute"></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取外接程序，在中指定的版本<xref href="System.AddIn.AddInAttribute"></xref>属性。

trans-unit.source: The version number is a free-form string.
trans-unit.target: 版本号为自由格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The version of the add-in, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the version number is not specified in the <xref href="System.AddIn.AddInAttribute"></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序的版本或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果中未指定的版本号<xref href="System.AddIn.AddInAttribute"></xref>属性。
